Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2009 05:25AM Tilly123 wrote: Jodi, I would be happy to chat with your friend.  I live in Boston (Cambridge) am 45, but live a very young lifestyle. (date, althletic, etc...) I am on almost the same meds as her except for Tamoxifen, I take Falsodex.  I was diagnosed with primary breast cancer 8 years ago when I was 37, bone mets appeared this Spring.  It was discoved via PET scan because I had lots of lymph node activity on the opposite breast side.  With some ups and down I am doing well now and perhaps could be of some comfort to her.  Feel free to PM me if you are so inclined.
Posts.Title: Stage IV, in bones, under 45? JodiTLG Tilly123
